name: Feel Vector Morph
description: Dynamic morphing between all four feel vectors using automation

performance.notes: Feel vectors morph over 40 bars. Each 8-bar section emphasizes different vector. Bar 1-8: Bite (percussive). Bar 9-16: Rubber (elastic). Bar 17-24: Hollow (ethereal). Bar 25-32: Growl (aggressive). Bar 33-40: All balanced. Creates evolving, morphing timbre.
performance.technique: Use automation lane to morph feel vectors over time. Smooth crossfading creates gradual transitions. Each vector has distinct character: Bite = punchy, Rubber = elastic, Hollow = thin, Growl = aggressive. Perfect for evolving pads or leads.
performance.structure: Bars 1-8: Bite phase (percussive attack). Bars 9-16: Morph to rubber (elastic pitch). Bars 17-24: Morph to hollow (thin, spacious). Bars 25-32: Morph to growl (distorted). Bars 33-40: Return to balanced.
performance.tip: Use slow automation for smooth morphs. Fast automation creates glitchy effects. Combine with filter automation for complex evolution.
